creator: TORN LTD
descriptionHtml:
TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.

In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

title: TORN

creator: TORN LTD
descriptionHtml:
TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.

title: TORN

creator: TORN LTD
descriptionHtml:
TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

title: TORN

creator: TORN LTD
descriptionHtml:
TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.

TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

title:
TORN
2.0.6

creator: TORN LTD
descriptionHtml:
TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

title:
TORN
2.2.15

creator: TORN LTD
descriptionHtml:
TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful

★ Scour the in-game newspaper for hints, tips and all the latest Torn City gossip

★ Immerse yourself in Torn's energetic forums and chat rooms for lively debate and constant competitions

★ Progress your character and play the game your way, then make your mark in our illustrious Hall of Fame

TORN is a massively multiplayer text RPG (Role Playing Game). Play now for free.
descriptionShort: Old-school massively multiplayer Text RPG set in a world of crime, cash & clans

creator: TORN LTD
descriptionHtml:
TORN - Worlds largest text-based RPG.

You are now entering Torn City; a dark and dirty metropolis inhabited by two million real people involved in virtual crime, conquest, commerce and more. In this open-world, text-based role-playing crime game you can be whoever you want, be it Bully, Businessman or Barbarian, so long as you’ve got the brains and bullets to back it up.

Torn City is so gritty and real that British Prime Minister Theresa May's staff used this game to learn about real criminal behaviour. Don't believe us? Google it.


★ Become a master criminal by doing drive-by hits, kidnapping the Mayor and bombing government buildings

★ Tool up for the streets with hundreds of unique weapons and armour items

★ Bulk up at the gym and train yourself into an elite urban warrior

★ Mug your opponents to relieve them of their hard earned cash, or just leave them in the streets

★ Go legit and land yourself a high-flying job at one of thousands of player-owned companies

★ Prove yourself worthy and earn an invite to join one of thousands of established factions

★ Work with faction-mates to wage wars, commit large scale crimes and conquer territory

★ Experiment with dangerous drugs to boost your battle stats and gain a crucial edge

★ Pay others to do your dirty work by bountying your bullies and sending them to the hospital

★ Establish yourself as a financial kingpin by making shrewd investments and swindling fellow players

★ Bust a cap and break bones in our tactical turn-based attacking system

★ Purchase essential and exotic items at the city's player-run bazaars, or start your own and rip people off

★ Bankrupt rival players at the casino through games of poker and blackjack

★ Interact with the most unsettlingly realistic NPC's ever seen in a RPG, if you dare

★ Earn money and respect by doing dodgy deeds for the city's shadiest characters

★ Marry another player and share your supplies, stacks and secrets

★ Steal or buy cars to modify and enter into illegal street races

★ Buy an apartment, pimp it out and work up to your very own private island

★ Bust out inmates from the city jail and beat them until they're grateful
